Invocation Name: my ventilation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The skill provides a Voice control for house ventilation systems, produced by the Helios ventilation company.

Account Linking is required to tie the skill with the account on the Helios "easycontrols" portal (which is a traditional interface to control ventilation units remotely).

Install:
- initiate skill account linking procedure
- after redirecting on the https://api.easycontrols.net/ site, please provide your credentials and confirm `Authorize alexa?` request.
- If you see `helios has been successfully linked`, then installation is finished.

Using skill:
There is two main ways to use the skill:
- "Alexa, open `my ventilation`" - starts the conversation between you and the skill, until you ask "Alexa stop" or skill finish the session.
- "Alexa, ask `my ventilation` for air status" (or any other intent) - the skill fulfills your intent and finish the session.

Commands:
- (tell me) status
- enable automatic mode
- enable manual mode
- set speed { 0..4 } (affects only in manual mode)
- enable party mode (for two hours)
- enable quiet mode (for twenty minutes)
- air quality | environment status
- details | full status
- help
